Project.title: Project
Project.description: Represents a project in the portfolio.

Contact.title: Contact Submission
Contact.description: Represents a message submitted via the contact form.

icon.description: Lucide icon name, or 'django'/'python' for custom icons.

gradient.description: Tailwind CSS gradient classes, e.g., 'from-green-600/80 to-teal-800/80'

Settings.title: Site Settings
Settings.description: Global settings for the portfolio site.

/projects/{projectId}.description: Stores individual project details. Publicly readable.

/contacts/{contactId}.description: Stores contact form submissions. Writable by anyone, but readable only by an authenticated admin.

/settings/{settingId}.description: Stores global site settings, like the profile image URL. Publicly readable.
